name: Psychometric Personality Profiler
description:
The Psychometric Personality Profiler was designed to adjust to the needs and personality of its participants.
This Test includes five question groups that reach into the deepest parts of your brain to figure out who you really are.

GAMEPLAY

  • Multiple Choice
  • Sliders
  • Textboxes
The way you answer the questions does not matter. You just need to stay truthful.

Rules

Keep your eyes on the Screen at ALL times!
